    • Constructor Detail

      • WmcManager

        public WmcManager(Sdd node,
                  boolean logMode)
        Creates a WMC manager for the SDD rooted at node and initializes literal weights. When log mode = false, all computations done by the manager will be in natural log-space. Literal weights are initialized to 0 in log-mode and to 1 otherwise. A number of functions are given below for passing values to, or recovering values from, a WMC manager. In log-mode, all these values are in natural logs. Finally, a WMC manager may become invalid if garbage collection or SDD minimization takes place.
        Parameters:
        node -
        logMode -

    • Method Detail

      • free

        public void free()
        Frees the memory of the WMC manager.

      • setLiteralWeight

        public void setLiteralWeight(long literal,
                             double weight)
        Sets the weight of a literal in the given WMC manager (should pass the natural log of the weight in log-mode).
        Parameters:
        literal -
        weight -

      • propagate

        public double propagate()
        Returns the weighted model count of the SDD underlying the WMC manager (using the current literal weights). This function should be called each time the weights of literals are changed.
        Returns:
        the weighted model count of the SDD underlying the WMC manager

      • getZeroWeight

        public double getZeroWeight()
        Returns:
        −∞ for log-mode and 0 otherwise

      • getOneWeight

        public double getOneWeight()
        Returns:
        0 for log-mode and 1 otherwise.

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight(long literal)
        Returns the weight of a literal.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the weight of a literal.

      • getDerivative

        public double getDerivative(long literal)
        Returns the partial derivative of the weighted model count with respect to the weight of literal. The result returned by this function is meaningful only after having called propagate().
        Parameters:
        literal -
        Returns:
        the partial derivative of the weighted model count

      • getProbability

        public double getProbability(long literal)
        Returns the probability of literal. The result returned by this function is meaningful only after having called propagate().
        Parameters:
        literal -
        Returns:
        the probability of literal.
